nodes.name: Trickster
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster has damage avoidance. Monster periodically flees.

nodes.name: Overcharged
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster grants charges to itself and allies over time

nodes.name: Echoist
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster repeats skills additional times

nodes.name: Deadeye
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster is accurate and applies marks

nodes.name: Vampiric
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster has augmented life leech powers

nodes.name: Assassin
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster has augmented critical powers and has shroud walker

nodes.name: Empowered Elements
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster cycles between imbued damage of a particular type and immunity to all other damage types
nodes.rewardDesc: Rewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

nodes.name: Evocationist
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster is imbued with elemental damage, resistances and ailments

nodes.name: Steel-infused
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster is imbued with physical damage and physical damage reduction

nodes.name: Chaosweaver
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster is imbued with chaos damage and resistance

nodes.name: Flameweaver
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster is imbued with fire damage and resistance

nodes.name: Frostweaver
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster is imbued with cold damage and resistance

nodes.name: Stormweaver
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster is imbued with lightning damage and resistance

nodes.name: Treant Horde
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster's minions are replaced with powerful treants. Some damage taken from the monster is split between the Treants
nodes.rewardDesc: Monster's Minions drop a randomly-chosen reward type

nodes.name: Toxic
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster has augmented poison powers

nodes.name: Sentinel
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster is imbued with Block and Spell Block. Monster triggers Reckoning when hit

nodes.name: Temporal Bubble
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster is protected by a Temporal Bubble that severely slows those in it and cannot be damaged by those outside of it

nodes.name: Juggernaut
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster cannot be Slowed or Stunned. Monster gains Endurance Charges

nodes.name: Hexxer
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster is Hexproof. Monster is followed by a Hexing Effigy that createds Hexing areas

nodes.name: Arcane Buffer
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster has augmented Energy Shield powers and releases a stunning nowa when Energy Shield breaks

nodes.name: Permafrost
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster has augmented Freeze and Chill powers

nodes.name: Crystal-skinned
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster triggers the creation of Crystals when hit. Crystals explode when the Monster dies

nodes.name: Rejuvenating
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster has Life Regeneration. Periodically releases a wave that heals nearby allies and prevents enemy Life and Energy Shield recovery
nodes.rewardDesc: Rewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

nodes.name: Berserker
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster enrages as it loses Life

nodes.name: Gargantuan
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster is massive, granting more Life, Area of Effect, and Damage

nodes.name: Effigy
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster creates and Effigy of the player. Damage dealt to the Effigy is also reflected to the bonded player
nodes.rewardDesc: Rewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

nodes.name: Malediction
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster has a weakening Aura

nodes.name: Corrupter
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster inflicts Corrupted Blood on Hit and when Hit. Minions create Corrupted Blood Bubbles on death
nodes.rewardDesc: Items dropped from the Monster and its Minions are Corrupted

nodes.name: Bloodletter
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster has augmented Bleed powers. Monster Maims nearby enemies

nodes.name: Arakaali-touched
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster uses the abilities of Arakaali
nodes.rewardDesc: All Reward Types are Divination Cards

nodes.name: Corpse Detonator
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster detonates nearby Corpses. Monster periodically creates Corpses

nodes.name: Necromancer
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster can raise Undead. Minions are empowered and revive shortly after dying
nodes.rewardDesc: Rewards are rolled 2 additional times, choosing the rarest result

nodes.name: Bombardier
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster has augmented Projectile powers and periodically unleashes a barrage or mortars

nodes.name: Incendiary
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster has augmented Ignite powers

nodes.name: Entangler
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster creates Thorned Vines that slow and deal Chaos Damage over time

nodes.name: Brine King-touched
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster uses the abilities of the Brine King
nodes.rewardDesc: Rewards are rolled 6 additional times, choosing the rarest result

nodes.name: Ice Prison
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster periodically entraps players in a cage of ice
nodes.rewardDesc: Rewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

nodes.name: Storm Strider
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster leaves Shocking Ground in its wake and spawns Lightning Mirages when hit. Minions create Storm Bearers on death

nodes.name: Hasted
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster is faster

nodes.name: Heralding Minions
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster's minions summon invulnerable Lightning Totems on death

nodes.name: Dynamo
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster augmented Shock powers

nodes.name: Shakari-touched
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster uses the abilities of Shakari

nodes.name: Soul Eater
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster empowers when nearby allies die. Priodically summons Phantasms

nodes.name: Soul Conduit
nodes.monsterDesc: On death, Monster and nearby allies are revived

nodes.name: Drought Bringer
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster disables Flask effects on Hit. Monster has an Aura that drains Flask charges and prevents gaining Flask charges

nodes.name: Kitava-touched
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster uses the abilities of Kitava

nodes.name: Abberath-touched
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster uses the abilities of Abberath
nodes.rewardDesc: Rewards are rolled 4 additional times, choosing the rarest result

nodes.name: Tukohama-touched
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster uses the abilities of Tukohama
nodes.rewardDesc: Rewards are rolled 4 additional times, choosing the rarest result

nodes.name: Flame Strider
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster leaves Burning Ground in its wake. Minions create Flame Bearers on death

nodes.name: Frenzied
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster and allies periodically Enrage

nodes.name: Bonebreaker
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster has augmented Stun Powers. Monster Hits are slower and can't be evaded

nodes.name: Executioner
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster gains Damage based on missing enemy Life. Monster has an Aura that prevents enemies recovering Life and Energy Shield above 50%

nodes.name: Magma Barrier
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster is protected by a Magmatic shield that explodes when depleted. Monster periodically createsw Volatile Flamebloods
nodes.rewardDesc: Rewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

nodes.name: Innocence-touched
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster uses the abilities of Innocence

nodes.name: Lunaris-touched
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster uses the abilities of Lunaris
nodes.rewardDesc: All Reward Types have an additional reward

nodes.name: Solaris-touched
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster uses the abilities of Solaris
nodes.rewardDesc: All Reward Types have an additional reward

nodes.name: Mirror Image
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster can create illusions of itself
nodes.rewardDesc: Rewards are rolled 2 additional times, choosing the rarest result

nodes.name: Mana Siphoner
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster is surrounded by a ring that deals Lightning Damage over time as well as draining mana
nodes.rewardDesc: Rewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

nodes.name: Invulnerable
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster and its Minions periodically become immune to all Damage. Minions cannot die while Monster is alive

nodes.name: Consecrator
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster periodically creates Consecrated Ground, healing allies and making them immune to curses and ailments

nodes.name: Empowering Minions
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster's minions are empowered. Minions empower the Monster with additional modifiers on death

nodes.name: Frost Strider
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster leaves Chilling Ground in its wake. Minions create Frost Bearers on death

nodes.name: Opulent
nodes.monsterDesc: Monster is fabulously wealthy
